text: +Mel Baton (Mellow Baton) Masahiro Andoh/ T-Square. He originally wrote this song for Grand Turismo, but later released the song with his band T-Square where it is known as "Knights Song".

text: The song's by an actual Japanese band, T-Square, and Japan is notoriously fiendish and picky with music rights, which is why a lot of series tend to get instrumental versions of songs overseas if not replace them entirely. "Moon Over the Castle" is one of many casualties as a result unfortunately.
